ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
cleanlab is the data-centric ML ops package for machine learning with noisy labels.
cleanlab cleans labels and supports finding, quantifying, and learning with
label errors in datasets. See datasets cleaned with cleanlab at labelerrors.com.
about.summary: The standard package for machine learning with noisy labels and finding mislabeled data in Python.

about.description:
cleanlab is the data-centric ML ops package for machine learning with noisy labels.
cleanlab cleans labels and supports finding, quantifying, and learning with
label errors in datasets. See datasets cleaned with cleanlab at labelerrors.com.
about.summary: The standard package for machine learning with noisy labels and finding mislabeled data in Python.

name: cleanlab
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cleanlab" %}
{% set version = "2.7.1" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3caabd4579e7a7681c86959cd1ab642aa035b9f08bf15671c0fdf18889177bb8

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  run:
    - numpy >=1.22,<2.dev0
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - scikit-learn >=1.1
    - termcolor >=2.4.0
    - tqdm >=4.53.0
    - pandas >=1.4.0

test:
  imports:
    - cleanlab
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/cleanlab/cleanlab
  summary: The standard package for machine learning with noisy labels and finding mislabeled data in Python.
  license: AGPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://pypi.org/project/cleanlab/#description
  dev_url: https://github.com/cleanlab/cleanlab
  description: |
    cleanlab is the data-centric ML ops package for machine learning with noisy labels.
    cleanlab cleans labels and supports finding, quantifying, and learning with
    label errors in datasets. See datasets cleaned with cleanlab at labelerrors.com.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mxr-conda
    - ndmaxar
    - oblute
    - rluria14
    - BastianZim
